title: Instagram Followers Scraper Input
description: Configuration for the Instagram Mobile API followers scraper

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: Instagram user ID to scrape followers from (numeric ID, not username)

authorization.title: Authorization Token
authorization.description: Bearer token from Instagram app. Get this using Frida. Format: IGT:2:eyJ...

device_id.title: Device ID
device_id.description: X-IG-Device-ID header value (UUID format). Capture with Frida.

android_id.title: Android ID
android_id.description: X-IG-Android-ID header value. Format: android-[16 hex chars]

www_claim.title: WWW Claim (IMPORTANT)
www_claim.description: X-IG-WWW-Claim HMAC token. CRITICAL for avoiding blocks. Capture with Frida when accessing followers.

max_followers.title: Max Followers
max_followers.description: Maximum number of followers to scrape. Leave empty for all.

delay_max.title: Maximum Delay (seconds)
delay_max.description: Maximum delay between requests (randomized between min and max)
